title: Up Court Mobile App
description: This application is a Full Stack Mobile application that helps basketball fans gain knowledge on how certain players preform depending on team and player match-ups. Wether it be player versus player or player versus team, this application will give you well informed information using the ChatGPT API.

imageAlt: Bounty Hunter Image of welcome page.
title: Bounty Hunter Mobile App
description: A mobile application that lets you create and track favors between friends, featuring friend lists, wishlists, customizable profiles, point systems, and more! This is a 6 person project and the creators (including myself) can be found in the source code.

title: Etch A Sketch
description: This is a combination of both a sketch pad and etch a sketch that allows the user to draw on a digtal pad. Here I will use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, DOM manipulation, and WebDev tools to program this sketch like webpage!

title: Tic Tac Toe
description: A browser version of Tic-Tac-Toe with a superhero twist! This game is made using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS with an emphasis on JS factory functions.

title: Admin Dashboard Design
description: Created an Admin Dashboard (style and structure only) that displays personal projects I have done. This project implements HTML (with HTML forms) and CSS (with CSS Grid and Flexbox).
